column1: You must help your crush clean their parent's house after they die.
column2: You must design a suspension bridge with your crush. If it kills anyone, you will both be held legally liable.
column3: You and your crush join an E-sports league.
column4: You get stranded in the desert with your crush and must find your way back to civilization.
column5: Your crush must perform an emergency tracheotomy on you.
column6: You and your crush test a device that allows you to see each other's dreams.
column7: You and your crush have to give an important presentation to the CEO.
column8: You and your crush hit the lottery.
column9: You and your crush find a treasure map and try to track down the treasure.
